nodes.text: Star Wars Annual 2008 is a book published in 2007 by Pedigree Books in the United Kingdom. It is the 4th Star Wars annual published by Pedigree Books. It was published with two different covers, one with half of Darth Vader's helmet (the back cover showing half of Yoda's face) and one with Darth Vader in three different poses. The annual was extremely detailed and factual with all pages being devoted to facts apart from one.
